name: Swampfire
description: A plant-like Methanosian alien with a fiery head and body. He can control plant life, regenerate from damage, and shoot fire.

name: Echo Echo
description: A small, white, living sonic cannon known as a Sonorosian. He can produce high-pitched sonic screams and duplicate himself to create a 'sonic wall'.

name: Humungousaur
abilities: Size increase, super strength, bone projectiles
description: A large, dinosaur-like Vaxasaurian alien with a scaly, reptilian body. He possesses incredible strength and can grow to an immense size.

name: Jetray
description: A manta ray-like Aerophibian alien who can fly and swim at supersonic speeds, and fire neuroshock blasts from his eyes and tail.

name: Big Chill
description: A Necrofriggian moth-like alien who can turn intangible, fly, and breathe a freezing vapor that can create large ice structures.

name: Chromastone
description: A living silicon-based alien with a body made of a durable crystalline substance that can absorb and redirect energy, and fire powerful energy beams.

name: Brainstorm
description: A highly intelligent, crab-like Cerebrocrustacean who can open his skull plates to reveal his brain and generate powerful electric thoughts and force fields.

name: Spidermonkey
description: A small Arachnichimp with four arms and six eyes who can spin powerful, sticky webs from his tail and has enhanced agility.

name: Alien X
description: A Celestialsapien who is one of the most powerful beings in the universe, capable of warping reality, though he is difficult to control due to his multiple conflicting personalities.

name: Goop
abilities: Can liquefy body, shape-shift, acid resistance, levitation via anti-gravity disc
description: A Polymorph composed of an intelligent green ooze that can change shape and is controlled by an Anti-Gravity Projector, making him nearly invulnerable.

name: Nanomech
abilities: Size manipulation, flight, energy blasts, can enter machinery
description: A small, robotic-like alien who can shrink to a microscopic size, fly at high speeds, and fire energy beams.

name: Lodestar
abilities: Magnetism manipulation, metal control, detachable head
description: A floating, metallic alien with magnetic powers. He can generate powerful magnetic fields to attract and repel metallic objects.

name: Rath
abilities: Super strength, agility, combat rage, enhanced durability
description: A large, orange, tiger-like Appoplexian alien with a volatile and aggressive personality. He possesses immense strength and agility.

name: Rocks
abilities: Rock manipulation, durability, can launch rock projectiles
description: A humanoid, stone-based alien with immense strength and heat resistance. He can generate earthquakes by stomping the ground but is slow and weak against water erosion.

name: Squidstrictor
abilities: Elastic limbs, constriction strength, underwater breathing
description: A cephalopod-like Cephalod-ae who can camouflage, shoot sticky ink, and has enhanced strength in his tentacles.
